summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Labour Management, Documents, and Custom Report Builder modules. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend fully functional with all 3 new modules accessible and properly implemented. Login, navigation, and core functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Labour Management page (/dashboard/labour) - Shows contractors and workers tabs with proper data
Documents page (/dashboard/documents) - Shows document upload and required checklist functionality
Custom Report Builder (/dashboard/report-builder) - Shows 6 report types, column selection, filters, and CSV export
Backend Labour POST APIs: POST /api/labour/contractors, POST /api/labour/workers (100% success)
Backend Documents APIs: GET /api/documents, /api/document-types, POST /api/documents, PUT /api/documents/{id}/verify (100% success)
Backend Expenses APIs: GET /api/expenses, /api/expense-categories, /api/my-expenses, POST /api/expenses, PUT /api/expenses/{id}/approve (100% success)
Backend Report Builder APIs: GET /api/employees, /api/departments, /api/reports/attendance, /api/reports/leave, /api/reports/headcount, /api/reports/expense (100% success)
Frontend UI: All 3 modules load correctly with proper layouts and styling
Frontend Navigation: Direct URL navigation to all 3 modules working perfectly
Frontend Interactions: Tabs, buttons, dialogs, and forms all functional
Data Integration: Backend data properly displayed in frontend tables and stats
Report Generation: Custom Report Builder successfully generates reports with preview
